name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: The Chilean miners have already agreed to a movie deal. Even though several studios wanted to tell their story, they chose to remake “Saturday Night Fever” instead.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: Bedbugs are spreading throughout the country. I guess they don’t have jobs. They lay around in bed all day and bite people.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: “The Talk” is a new show that features six women of different backgrounds discussing issues. Some people say it’s a rip-off of “The View,” but it’s not. “The View” has five women.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: TLC just released a promo for Sarah Palin’s new reality show. Haven’t the last two years been her reality show?
